title-group.article-title: An Overview of Automotive Control Actuators

permissions.copyright-statement: Copyright 1985 Society of Automotive Engineers, Inc.

abstract.p: Automotive microcomputer controls require power-level actuators to provide the physical control inputs to the system controlled, just as they need sensors for measuring the control parameters. The paper describes various actuators available for or in use in U.S. automobiles and trucks. Possible future developments are suggested.
